input.job_description:
Bachelor's Degree in Electrical engineering   
CGPA  3.3/4  (2020-2024)
                   
DAE Electrical   88% International Islamic universty Islamabad
Government College OF Technology Rawalpindi
Blue Star Public School
Matric   72%SUMMARY
WORK EXPERIENCE EDUCATION
 SKILLSst #11 Madina Colony Misrial Road, Rawalpindiadeelghaffar81@gmail.com+923495470821ADEEL GHAFFAR
Electrical Engineer
Electrical Engineer with hands-on experience in electrical and electronics systems, including biomedical appliances.
Proficient in troubleshooting, repair, and maintenance. Passionate about inverters and converters, and seeking a role to
apply my expertise in this area within a forward-thinking company. Eager to leverage my knowledge in innovative power
conversion technologies to drive advancements in the field.
Proteus
Circuit Analysis
Matlab/ Simulink
Arduino
ESP Controllers
Sensor Interfacing
Electronic circuits
 ADDITIONAL SKILLS
    
      Soft Skill
 3d Modeling/Animation
Adobe After Affect
MS word 
Mendely
Report Writing
     Hard Skill
Electrical Wiring
motor winding (basic)
Repearing of appliances
welding  Biomedical InterneeEngineer (June 2023 – Sep 2023)Electrical InterneeEngineer (June 2022 –Sep 2022)
During my internship at Rawalpindi Institute of Cardiology as a
Biomedical Engineering intern:
Gained hands-on experience in medical device maintenance
and repair.
Acquired valuable insights into healthcare technology
management.Gained extensive hands-on experience with distribution boards
(DB), electric lines, and safety equipment.
Actively involved in the installation, maintenance, and
troubleshooting of electrical systems.
Enhanced practical knowledge of electrical components.
Ensured compliance with safety standards and regulations.
Improved technical skills.
PROJECTS
Embedded Intelligence-based Innovative Smart Stick for
VisuallyImpaired Individuals (FYDP)
Arduino-based Heart rate and Oxygen Level smart monitoring
system
Suspension Systemof vehicals
Uninterruptible powersupply
DC to AC  Inverte
H Bridge  converter
REFERENCES
 zeshan.aslam@ilu.edu.pkDr. Zeshan Aslam Khan
Email:  khizer.mehmood@ilu.edu.pkDr. Khizer Mehmood

Computer Engineering.
International University.

input.additional_info: Our company values diversity in educational backgrounds and considers candidates from all accredited universities. Remote work options are available; however, relocation support is not provided. Skills and technical proficiency are assessed through a combination of online assessments and virtual interviews. We focus on the candidate's ability to learn new technologies and integrate into our team culture.
minimum_requirements: Basic understanding of solar energy systems
Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering
